flawed_nl_solution:
Quinton had 40 cupcakes - 18 = <<40-18=27>>27 cupcakes.
He then had 27 cupcakes - 16 students = <<27-16=11>>11 cupcakes.
Quinton then gave away 11 - 1 - 1 - 1 - 1 = <<11-1-1-1-1=7>>7 cupcakes left.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 27. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
